entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -37.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 04:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -37.9°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -54
Dewpoint: -41.7°C
Wind: NNW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Clear. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill near minus 54. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill minus 52 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
